name: ZamzamKit_iOS
summary: A Swift framework for rapidly developing iOS apps.
description:
ZamzamKit_iOS is a Swift framework for iOS to allow
developers to code rapidly for building mobile applications.
Focus on solutions by using our API that sits as an
abstraction layer on top of iOS SDK's and Swift.
ZamzamKit_iOS provides you the latest patterns, techniques,
and libraries so you can begin building for the future.
